short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 在 Amazon Listing 列表页获取每种产品的重要数据, 帮您发现利润潜力最大的产品
short.en_US: Easily compare products on the Amazon page, Help you choose the right product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
在 Amazon Listing 列表页获取每种产品的重要数据, 帮您发现利润潜力最大的产品。

使用 EarData - 亚马逊卖家助手，您可以轻松的在 Amazon 页面上进行产品比较，或者将他们一键导出到 Excel 来归类汇总，帮助您发现利润潜力最大的产品，市场分析快人一步。

✨ Listing 基础信息扩展, 快速获取信息
✨ Listing 核心关键词查看, 了解 Listing 核心词是什么
✨ 搜索关键词, 在 Listing 的曝光曲线
✨ 历史价格与 BSR 数据查看

✨基础信息支持全部 Amazon 站点
✨关键词支持市场: 美国, 英国, 德国, 日本


EarData 让你更快了解 Listing 流量变化, 看到更立体的 Listing.
long.en_US:
Extract key data from Amazon listings to help you discover the most profitable products.

With Amazon Quick View by EarData, you can easily compare products on Amazon pages or export them to Excel with one click for classification and aggregation to help you find the most potentially profitable products. Stay ahead in market analysis.

✨ Extend basic information for Listings to quickly acquire details 
✨ View core keywords of a Listing to understand essential terms
✨ Search keywords and analyze their exposure in Listings
✨ View historical price and BSR (Best Seller Rank) data

✨ Basic information is supported across all Amazon sites
✨ Keyword support in markets: USA, UK, Germany, Japan

EarData gives you insights into Listing traffic changes, providing a comprehensive view of the Listings.
